document.full_text: talismanic san francisco giants catcher buster posey is likely to miss the rest of the season because of a leg fracture, the world series champions said on thursday.
document.title: giants catcher posey likely out for rest of season
lines_and_colors: talismanic san francisco giants catcher buster posey is likely to miss the rest of the season because of a leg fracture, the world series champions said on thursday.
